content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and storage facility at position (42.5, -83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (41.0, -82.0))
- Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -82.0)) with a drop position at (42.5, -83.5)
- Burner inserter (position (43.5, -80.5)) that moves items between the mining drill and the chests
- Chests at positions (42.5, -83.5), (44.5, -81.5), (43.5, -79.5), and (45.5, -80.5) for storing coal

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the quantity to be extracted is greater than 0
### Errors when using burners
- Ensure the burner has sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when using chests
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to insert items
- Ensure the chest is not empty before attempting to extract items
### Errors when using mining drills
- Ensure the mining drill has a valid drop position
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before continuing mining
